targets.query: SELECT count("host") FROM "tomee_access_log_tomee" WHERE ("response_code" >= 200 AND "response_code" < 300) AND ("aarp_env" =~ /^$aarp_env$/ AND "aarp_role" =~ /^ws(_appsec)?$/ AND "host"::field =~ /^$secure_aarp_org$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT count("host") FROM "tomee_access_log_tomee" WHERE ("response_code" >= 300 AND "response_code" < 400) AND ("aarp_env" =~ /^$aarp_env$/ AND "aarp_role" =~ /^ws(_appsec)?$/ AND "host"::field =~ /^$secure_aarp_org$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
